header.e: Effective to must be larger than or equal to effective from.

header.v: Tồn tại khai báo đã có phát sinh liên quan, không thể ghi đè.
header.e: There existed a declaration has data constraints, the data cannot be overwritten.

header.v: Nhà cung cấp, vùng cung ứng và phạm vi khai báo ngày hiệu lực không được giao hoặc trùng nhau.
header.e: The vendor, supplying plant and effective date range must not be overlapped or duplicated.

field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs)⩓not exists(select 1 from sysunitrights b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and b.user_id = @user and b.r_new = 1)

field.name: ma_bp0
field.check: ma_bp0 not in (select ma_bp from bidmbp0)⩓not exists(select 1 from bisyspurorgrights b where @@table.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and b.user_id = @user and b.r_new = 1)

field.name: ma_vung
field.check: ma_vung not in (select ma_vung from bidmvung where ma_dvcs = @@table.ma_dvcs and (@admin = 1 or not exists(select 1 from bisysplantrights where user_id = @user) or ma_vung in (select ma_vung from bisysplantrights where user_id = @user)) and (not exists(select 1 from bidmbp0g1 where ma_vung = bidmvung.ma_vung) or ma_vung in (select ma_vung from bidmbp0g1 where ma_bp0 = @@table.ma_bp0)))

field.name: ma_vt
field.check: ma_vt not in (select ma_vt from dmvt)

field.name: ma_kh
field.check: ma_kh <> '' and ma_kh not in (select ma_kh from &VendorList;)

field.name: vung_cu
field.check: vung_cu <> '' and vung_cu not in (select ma_vung from bidmvung)⩓vung_cu = @@table.ma_vung

processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(1), @datetime0 datetime declare @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @k int, @count int, @voucherID varchar(8) select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_ws_id' select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @voucherID = 'P01', @datetime0 = getdate()
-- Check @@checking
if @admin <> 1 and @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'BISLTran', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end
if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a join bim01$000000 b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_vung = b.ma_vung and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt
if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ngay_hl_tu', a.stt, 'C003' from @@table a join (select * from @@table) b on a.stt <> b.stt and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_vung = b.ma_vung and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh and a.vung_cu = b.vung_cu and (a.ngay_hl_tu between b.ngay_hl_tu and b.ngay_hl_den or b.ngay_hl_tu between a.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den) &w1;'ngay_hl_tu'&w2;a.stt&w3;'C002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'ngay_hl_tu', @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a join (select * from @@table) b on a.stt <> b.stt and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_vung = b.ma_vung and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh and a.vung_cu = b.vung_cu and (a.ngay_hl_tu between b.ngay_hl_tu and b.ngay_hl_den or b.ngay_hl_tu between a.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den)&Error; end
if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'vung_cu', stt, '00002' from @@table where ma_kh <> '' and vung_cu <> '' &w1;'vung_cu'&w2;stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'vung_cu', @r = min(stt) from @@table where ma_kh <> '' and vung_cu <> ''&Error; end
if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_kh', stt, '00002' from @@table where ma_kh = '' and vung_cu= '' &w1;'ma_kh'&w2;stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'ma_kh', @r = min(stt) from @@table where ma_kh = '' and vung_cu = ''&Error; end
-- stt_rec0, line_nbr select identity(int, 1, 1) as id, cast(stt as int) as stt, rtrim(ma_dvcs) + rtrim(ma_bp0) + rtrim(ma_vung) + rtrim(ma_vt) as c, cast(0 as int) as ln into #ln from @@table order by ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_vung, ma_vt, stt exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateLineNumber create index i on #ln(stt)
select a.*, b.stt_rec into #k from @@table a join bim01$000000 b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_vung = b.ma_vung and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt delete @@table from @@table a join #k b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_vung = b.ma_vung and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt
if @@admin = 0 and @type = '1' begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_dvcs', stt, 'C002' from #k where not exists(select 1 from sysunitrights b where #k.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and b.user_id = @user and b.r_edit = 1) &w1;'ma_dvcs'&w2;stt&w3;'C002'&w4; &EndErrorCount;
&StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_bp0', stt, 'C002' from #k where not exists(select 1 from bisyspurorgrights b where #k.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and b.user_id = @user and b.r_edit = 1) &w1;'ma_bp0'&w2;stt&w3;'C002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'ma_dvcs', @r = min(stt) from #k where not exists(select 1 from sysunitrights b where #k.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and b.user_id = @user and b.r_edit = 1)&Error; select @field = 'ma_bp0', @r = min(stt) from #k where not exists(select 1 from bisyspurorgrights b where #k.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and b.user_id = @user and b.r_edit = 1)&Error; end end
if @type = '1' begin select b.stt_rec, b.ma_dvcs, b.status, b.user_id0, b.datetime0, cast('' as char(6)) as p, min(a.stt) as stt into #owdata from #k a join bim01$000000 b with(nolock) on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec group by b.stt_rec, b.ma_dvcs, b.status, b.user_id0, b.datetime0 select top 1 cast('' as char(6)) as p into #owpartition &ImportOverwriteVoucherLogDeleting; end &EndErrorMode;
select top 0 stt_rec, ma_dvcs, ma_ct, ma_bp0, ma_vung, ma_vt, dien_giai into #m1 from bim01$000000 select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ma_ct, ma_kh, vung_cu, ngay_hl_tu, ngay_hl_den, cd_ncc, ghi_chu, ma_nguon into #d1 from bid01$000000 select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_vung, c$, m$, d$, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i1 from bii01$000000
select @count = count(*) from @@table if @count > 0 begin select top 0 stt_rec, ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_vung, ma_vt, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id1 from bim01$000000 insert into #id1 select '', ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_vung, ma_vt, min(stt) from @@table group by ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_vung, ma_vt
select @k = count(*) from #id1 exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @k, @@userID, '#id1'
insert into #m1 select b.stt_rec, a.ma_dvcs, @voucherID, a.ma_bp0, a.ma_vung, a.ma_vt, a.dien_giai from @@table a join #id1 b on a.stt = b.stt
insert into #d1 select b.stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(i.ln), i.ln, @voucherID, a.ma_kh, a.vung_cu, a.ngay_hl_tu, a.ngay_hl_den, a.cd_ncc, a.ghi_chu, @voucherID from @@table a join #id1 b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_vung = b.ma_vung and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt join #ln i on a.stt = i.stt
insert into #i1 select stt_rec, null, '', ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_vung, rtrim(ma_dvcs) + rtrim(ma_bp0) + rtrim(ma_vung) + rtrim(ma_vt) + stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(ma_bp0) + '#20$' + rtrim(ma_vung) + '#30$' + rtrim(ma_vt), '' from #m1 select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i1', '#d1', 'd$', 'ma_kh, vung_cu, ma_nguon', '#10$, #20$, #30$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q
-- Insert/Update @@inserting(master); @@inserting(detail); @@inserting(inquiry); end
if @type = '1' begin select @k = count(*) from #k
if @k > 0 begin select top 0 stt_rec, ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_vung, ma_vt, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id2 from bim01$000000 insert into #id2 select b.stt_rec, a.ma_dvcs, a.ma_bp0, a.ma_vung, a.ma_vt, min(a.stt) from #k a join bim01$000000 b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_vung = b.ma_vung and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt group by a.ma_dvcs, a.ma_bp0, a.ma_vung, a.ma_vt, b.stt_rec
truncate table #m1 insert into #m1 select a.stt_rec, a.ma_dvcs, @voucherID, a.ma_bp0, a.ma_vung, a.ma_vt, a.dien_giai from #k a join #id2 b on a.stt = b.stt
truncate table #d1 insert into #d1 select b.stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(i.ln), i.ln, @voucherID, a.ma_kh, a.vung_cu, a.ngay_hl_tu, a.ngay_hl_den, a.cd_ncc, a.ghi_chu, @voucherID from #k a join #id2 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec join #ln i on a.stt = i.stt
truncate table #i1 insert into #i1 select stt_rec, null, '', ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_vung, rtrim(ma_dvcs) + rtrim(ma_bp0) + rtrim(ma_vung) + rtrim(ma_vt) + stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(ma_bp0) + '#20$' + rtrim(ma_vung) + '#30$' + rtrim(ma_vt), '' from #m1 select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i1', '#d1', 'd$', 'ma_kh, vung_cu, ma_nguon', '#10$, #20$, #30$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q
-- Insert/Update update bim01$000000 set dien_giai = b.dien_giai, datetime2 = @datetime0, user_id2 = @user from bim01$000000 a join #m1 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec
delete bid01$000000 where stt_rec in (select distinct stt_rec from #id2) @@inserting(detail);
update bii01$000000 set c$ = b.c$, d$ = b.d$, m$ = b.m$, ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0, ma_vung = b.ma_vung, ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs from bii01$000000 a join #i1 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec end end
